price: Tidakkah engkau melihat, bahwa sesungguhnya Kami telah mengutus setan-setan itu kepada orang-orang kafir untuk mendorong mereka (berbuat maksiat) dengan sungguh-sungguh?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا ٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ تَؤُزُّهُمۡ أَزّٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam tara annā arsalnā al-shayāṭīna ʿalā al-kāfirīna ta-uzzuhum azzan
